WorkItem.ClosedComment: Data files have been updated, this is no longer an issue
WorkItem.Description:
I was looking at the Rawr item database to boost my tanking skills and I saw couple of items without a sockets. (I am not worry about the socket bonus on item that are not out yet) I am using the Rawr for a Mac computer. 
 
Harbinger's Bone Band needed a yellow socket.
 
Harbinger's Bone Band
Binds when equipped
Unique-Equipped
Finger
+69 Strength
+124 Stamina
(  )Yellow Socket
Socket Bonus: +6 Stamina
Requires Level 80
Item Level 264
Equip: Increases defense rating by 60
Equip: Increases your dodge rating by 60
Equip: Improves hit rating by 38
 
I think there is a ring that is missing from the database and it is Ashen Band of Endless Courage.
 
Ashen Band of Endless Courage
Binds when picked up
Unique
Finger
+68 Strength
+130 Stamina
(  ) Yellow Socket
Socket Bonus: +6 Stamina
Item Level 277
Requires The Ashen Verdict - Exalted
Equip: Increases defense rating by 59.
Equip: Increases your dodge rating by 59.
Equip: Improves hit rating by 55.
Equip: When struck in combat has a chance of increasing your armor by 2400 for 10 sec.
 
Is there a way that I can change the gems to JC gems because there are couple that should be 51 Stamina, because what if I like the combination but change the blue sockets to JC gems?
 
I was testing my idea from wowhead and I have couple JC gems on it; http://www.wowhead.com/?profile=19850611.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Gem sockets not showing and other problem

Comments.Message: Are you sure you were looking at the correct iLevel versions of those items? There's a bunch out there that have lower versions with no sockets.

Harbinger's Bone Band have a socket no matter what. These item are found in wowhead. I even found one in the AH with a socket. 

I also found couple more problem with your database. Lasherweave Headguard (251) should have a meta and in the database it is listed as no meta socket.
Ohh, you're talking the Rawr3 default data files? Those are from 3.3 PTR.

Yeah, I even found a way to fix the gear (socket and Socket bonus) but I can't add the sockets to those gear yet. I have to give the database a B- grade, it look very good. 

I got to 51.579% dodge from your data with 51k health. I will need to find out how to fix the gems choice with my profession.

I love my job as a Tank, but I need to make sure that the gear set up match what being posted on wowhead since they fail to give me what happen when I go Bear form.

I read other report dealing with Rawr3, I think I found a way to solve the problem with the socket in some of the gear, I will work on those gear first then try to fix the problem with the gem being the wrong type for me.

Right now I am getting the Spinning Wheel of Death that tell me that the program I am using is taking alot of data from my computer, I was trying to built my talent and I have to wait for 1 minute for the program to put one point. I felt that it is going to take me 71 minute to build my talent. 

Also I can't seem to not be able to save the file of changes.

The exalted ashen band for mage is not in the inventory, and the dislodged trinket is not showing the proc. But I believe you can edit the items to add in these features. I did it for the ring, haven't tried on the trink yet (since I dont have it).
